text:
This is not a solicited review. Staff is very friendly when I brought for the first time today. Food is pretty surprisingly good! Will try again. I tried all types of chicken skewers.

But the display food looks very unappetising. I feel can be improved. Just honest feedback.

Edit: Revisited it again today, same friendly staff, and same great taste!!! It’s starting to become my favourite place to eat.

Edit 2: I have eaten here 10 over times and the quality never drops. Highly recommend!
So delicious. Friendly service. Order and freshly grilled on the spot, some waiting time required. I love that they gave kimchi instead of Japanese pickles. There’s a small seating area at the side.

Bought 2 sets with a drink at $9.50 per set.
Rice with 2 sticks chicken & 1 wagyu beef.
Packed nicely in a bag.
Staff was friendly and service was fast.
Freshly grilled. Service is good but too bad the sauce and rice is cold. Hopefully next time improve.
ordered bento B and C, the yakitori stick and frieds all nice and crispy enough. definitely gonna repeat again! deserve the 5 stars
